channel.title: react on vesey.tech
channel.description: Recent content in react on vesey.tech

item.title: hddcheap
item.description: For homelabbers, locating cheap, shuckable hard drives is an occasional necessity. Amazon doesn’t expose an easy API to allow us to scrape drive data. Hddcheap gives you that live data in an easy-to-read grid format. (I’ve noticed the camelcamelcamel images will not load if you are on a VPN - they are likely blocking known VPN IPs) https://hddcheap.vesey.tech

item.title: versefind
item.description: Ever remember a snatch of lyrics from a song you know you have saved in your Spotify library? Ever search for that brief phrase in Google but find only unrelated tracks? That can be enough to drive a person crazy. I wrote a tool that lets you search through your library to find these earworms. https://versefind.vesey.tech
